mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (reply_no, board_no, user_no, regdate, content) VALUES (seq_reply.nextVal, #{boardNo}, #{userNo}, sysdate, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_no as replyNo, board_no as boardNo, user_no as userNo, regdate, content FROM reply where board_no=#{boardNo} order by reply_no desc, regdate desc
